title: Journey - Revelation (2008)  - cd 1 & 2
description:
In December 2007  Journey hired Filipino singer Arnel Pineda of the cover band The Zoo after Neal Schon saw him on YouTube singing covers of Journey songs. Journey debuted their new lead singer in February 2008 at the ViÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â±a del Mar International Song Festival in Chile, released an album with the singer, titled Revelation, and announced a summer tour...


CD 1 is all new material ..
while CD 2 is re-recorded Journey songs with the new singer...

i&#039;ve seen this guy on TV....he&#039;s  damn good!!!

hope you enjoy !!!


PS.... this is a 3 disc set with 2 music CD&#039;s and a bonus DVD....the DVD will be in a seperate torrent from the music CD&#039;s because i thought alot of people wouldn&#039;t want to suffer through the download of a dvd just to check out the music... ( covers & insert booklet included )

the DVD is 4.01 GB and is not compressed...i just ran it through DVD Decrypter....
